The Collection

Sol Buttz is a collection of 888 pixelated NFT.
Created one by one by the pixel artist Daneli.sol, the collection aim to become a viral meme on Solana NFT space.

Get whitelisted

$BUTTZ Token

Built to rule the Sol Buttz DAO will be used as currency to mint the ultra-memeableSol Buttz NFT collection.
After mint, $BUTTZ will offer multiple utilities and passive icome opportunities to an always growing community of holders.

  • Liquidity burned

    Aiming to build and enforce trust with the community and holders, all LP tokens were burnt and liquidity locked forever

  • Mint disabled

    Thanks to mint authority disabled, $BUTTZ total supply is capped forever and any token can be ever minted

  • Recursive token burns

    With the purpose of dilute total supply, additional token burns are already planned and will happen recursively.

  • NFT Staking

    Stake your NFT token(s) to earn $BUTTZ rewards redeemable through raffle, merchandising, access to 'BUTTZPAY' raid to earn program and many moe utilites.

  • BUTTZPAY R2E

    Raid to earn program designed to maximise the power of community distributing payouts in BUTTZ, Solana or USDC to all elgibile @ButtzRaiders.

  • DAO and Community

    Astro is an open source project powered by hundreds of contributors making thousands of individual contributions.

<

Trade, swap and earn $BUTTZ

$BUTTZ is listed on all major Solana DEX.
Join liquidity pool farm on Raydium for collecting more rewards, or swap and place limit order through Jupiter aggregator.
